content:
I, #{userName}, hereby pledge to gently pat a pet on #{selected_days} starting from today until #{auto_destruct} between #{time_range}.
To prove my commitment, I will send a photo each day of myself patting a pet on the days I’ve committed.
This is my promise to myself — to give kindness, share warmth, and connect with the living beings that love without words. 🐾❤️

basicQuest.title: Pat a Pet
basicQuest.instructions:
A simple pat can mean the world to a furry friend. Whether it’s a wagging tail, a purring cat, or even a curious bird — touch is connection.

Take a moment to slow down, offer affection, and feel the heartbeat of another life. They don't ask for much — just love in return.

AiSnap.taskDescription: a person patting a pet like a cat or dog
